page.title: 06HORTICULTURE
page.content:
There are{Two}garden nurseries, selling plants and shrubs at{ {Round Bush}in square {1498.} The {Aldenham Heather Nurseries}specialises in heather and shrubs, but also sells other garden produce, particularly { {alpina.
Next door is the {Aldenham Garden {Centre,}which has more varied produce, particularly vegetables and herbaceous plants. Both nurseries have large greenhouses. Customers will come from {RADLETT, ELSTREE, BUSHEY and WATFORD} to visit these nurseries.
{Blackbirds Farm}has a large 'pick your own' area at {143997,}with a considerable area for car parking. The produce begins with spring produce such as {Rhubarb,}followed by {Broad {Beans}and then all the {Soft Fruits.
